channel.title: Blast! Where did the medkit go?
channel.description:
Blast Pit, Silo D. At the very first airlock if I enter with a medkit, and push the button inside, as the red light glows up the medkit vanishes. No matter if I hold it or if it's on the ground. If I push the button again, to open the outer door, the medkit reappears though.
I tried this with a steel barrel for example, but nothing extraordinary happened then. I guess medkits are not allowed into the central area.
[img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/578967585342081423/55DB98A41E5C8630C1AB6FB17F829CD51D93F8B1/[/img]
[img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/578967585342058537/38FF91D8E1A2823EB0DEBA5FD1FBE19FAC2ED17B/[/img]
